about.mission: Our mission is simple: make authentic Texas tortillas accessible to everyone, no matter where you live. From breakfast tacos in New York to fajita night in California, Lonestar brings the taste of Texas to your kitchen.

step1.title: Order Online
step1.text: Browse our selection of authentic H-E-B corn, flour, and butter tortillas. Choose your favorites and place your order.

step2.title: We Source & Pack
step2.text: We carefully source your tortillas from H-E-B and pack them securely for shipping. All products are shelf-stable and ship fresh.

step3.title: Delivered to You
step3.text: Your tortillas arrive at your door, ready for your pantry. No refrigeration needed—just authentic Texas taste whenever you want it.

HEB-BUTTER.name: H-E-B Bakery Butter Tortillas

HEB-WHEAT.name: H-E-B Bakery Wheat Tortillas

HEB-GREEN-SAUCE.name: H-E-B That Green Sauce
HEB-GREEN-SAUCE.description: The legendary H-E-B That Green Sauce. Perfect for tacos, enchiladas, and everything in between.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Lonestar Tortillas?
whyChoose.premiumText: Authentic Texas-style tortillas made with quality ingredients
whyChoose.fastText: 2-3 day delivery anywhere in the US

aboutTortillas.title: About Our Tortillas
aboutTortillas.cornText: Our corn tortillas are made with authentic nixtamalized masa, giving them that distinctive flavor that Texans love. Perfect for tacos, enchiladas, tostadas, and chilaquiles. Naturally gluten-free and packed with traditional Mexican flavor. Each tortilla is soft, pliable, and holds up beautifully whether you're frying them crisp or warming them soft.
aboutTortillas.flourText: Our premium flour tortillas are soft, stretchy, and perfect for burritos, quesadillas, and wraps. Made with simple ingredients, these tortillas stay soft and pliable, even after refrigeration. The larger size makes them ideal for loading up with your favorite fillings without worrying about tears or breaks.
aboutTortillas.butterText: The crown jewel of Texas tortillas. Our butter flour tortillas have a rich, indulgent taste that elevates any dish. The buttery flavor makes them perfect for breakfast tacos, and they're incredible simply warmed and eaten on their own. These are the tortillas that Texans crave when they move away from the Lone Star State.
aboutTortillas.freshnessText: All our tortillas are shelf-stable, meaning they don't require refrigeration and arrive fresh at your door. Each package has a 60-day shelf life from production. Once opened, store in an airtight container or resealable bag for best results. Warm before serving for the ultimate tortilla experience.

faq.title: Shopping FAQs
faq.shippingCostA: Shipping is a flat rate of $12.99 for all orders. We offer free shipping on orders over $45. All orders ship via USPS Priority Mail for fast, reliable delivery.
faq.arrivalA: Most orders arrive within 2-3 business days. Orders to Alaska and Hawaii may take 4-7 business days. We ship Monday through Friday, and orders placed before 2 PM CT ship the same day.
faq.refrigerationQ: Do I need to refrigerate the tortillas?
faq.refrigerationA: No! Our H-E-B tortillas are shelf-stable and don't require refrigeration. They maintain freshness at room temperature for 3-4 weeks unopened. After opening, you can refrigerate to extend freshness or freeze for longer storage.
faq.paymentQ: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentA: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover) as well as Apple Pay and Google Pay. All transactions are secured with industry-standard encryption.
faq.bulkQ: Can I buy in bulk for restaurants or events?
faq.bulkA: Yes! We offer quantity discounts for bulk orders. Our multi-pack options provide savings of 5-15% depending on quantity. For very large orders or restaurant accounts, please contact us directly.
faq.damagedQ: What if my tortillas arrive damaged?
faq.damagedA: We stand behind our products. If your tortillas arrive damaged or aren't up to our quality standards, contact us within 48 hours of delivery and we'll make it right with a replacement or refund.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.responseTime: We'll get back to you soon.

faq.stillHaveQuestionsText: We're here to help! Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you quickly.

seo.title: About Ordering H-E-B® Tortillas Online
seo.paragraph1: Can you buy H-E-B tortillas outside of Texas? Yes! Lonestar Tortillas makes it easy to order authentic H-E-B® tortillas online and have them delivered anywhere in the United States. Whether you're in New York, California, Florida, or anywhere in between, you can now enjoy the same quality tortillas that Texans have loved for generations.
seo.paragraph2: Our shelf-stable tortillas are perfect for online ordering because they don't require refrigeration during shipping. This means your tortillas arrive fresh and delicious, ready to store in your pantry until you're ready to use them. We ship from Austin, Texas, and most orders arrive within 3-5 business days.

hero.title: H-E-B Tortillas Shipped to All 50 States
hero.description: Lonestar Tortillas ships authentic H-E-B Bakery tortillas nationwide from Austin, Texas. Orders ship same-day before 2 PM CT via USPS Priority Mail. Delivery takes 2-3 business days. We are an independent reseller, not affiliated with H-E-B.

seller.title: About the Seller
seller.description: Lonestar Tortillas is an independent reseller of H-E-B products based in Austin, Texas. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to H-E-B Grocery Company. We purchase authentic H-E-B Bakery tortillas locally and ship them to customers nationwide.

hero.title: OUR STORY
hero.subtitle: begins in Texas
hero.description: What started as a desperate midnight Google search for "H-E-B® tortillas shipped to NYC" became a mission to help fellow tortilla refugees nationwide.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.quote: "To rescue tortilla-deprived Americans from mediocre wraps"
mission.description: Look, we get it. You moved away from Texas and suddenly realized that not all tortillas are created equal. We're here because we had the same existential crisis. Now we're just some folks who go to H-E-B®, buy tortillas, and ship them to people who understand the struggle.

cta.title: BE PART OF OUR STORY
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of families enjoying authentic Texas tortillas delivered nationwide

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.desc: H-E-B® sets the standard for tortilla excellence in Texas

trust.title: TRUST
trust.desc: The brand Texans have relied on for generations

expertise.title: EXPERTISE
expertise.desc: We know how to source and ship H-E-B® products perfectly

freshness.title: Our Freshness Promise
freshness.intro: At Lonestar Tortillas, we understand that freshness is everything when it comes to tortillas. That's why we've developed a sourcing and shipping process that ensures every package arrives at your door with the same quality you'd find on H-E-B® shelves in Texas.

sourcing.title: Direct-from-Store Sourcing
sourcing.text: We source our H-E-B® tortillas directly from stores in Texas, selecting only products with optimal freshness dates. Our team regularly rotates inventory to ensure you receive tortillas with maximum shelf life remaining. We never sell products that are close to expiration.

packaging.title: Shelf-Stable Packaging
packaging.text: H-E-B® tortillas are already designed for extended shelf life at room temperature. This means no refrigeration is required during shipping, and your tortillas arrive ready to use. Most products have a 30-45 day shelf life, giving you plenty of time to enjoy them.

shipping.title: Fast, Protected Shipping
shipping.text: Orders are shipped within 24 hours via USPS Priority or UPS Ground, arriving in 2-3 business days. Each package is carefully padded to prevent damage during transit. During extreme weather, we monitor conditions and may delay shipments to protect product quality.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
guarantee.text: If you receive damaged tortillas or are unsatisfied for any reason, contact us within 7 days for a full replacement or refund. We stand behind every H-E-B® product we ship.

cta.title: TASTE THE DIFFERENCE
cta.subtitle: Experience why H-E-B® tortillas are the gold standard - now available nationwide

step1.title: Order Confirmed
step1.desc: Your order is received and payment is processed. You'll receive an email confirmation with your order details.

step2.title: Processing
step2.desc: Orders placed before 2 PM CT Monday-Friday are packed the same day. Weekend orders ship Monday.

step3.title: Shipped
step3.desc: Your tortillas ship via USPS Priority Mail. You'll receive tracking information via email.

step4.title: Delivered
step4.desc: Most orders arrive in 2-3 business days. Alaska and Hawaii may take 4-7 days.

q1.question: Where is my tracking number?
q1.answer: Your tracking number is emailed once your order ships, typically within 1 business day. Check your spam folder if you don't see it.

q2.question: Do tortillas need refrigeration during shipping?
q2.answer: No! H-E-B tortillas are shelf-stable and don't require refrigeration. They stay fresh at room temperature for 3-4 weeks unopened.

q3.question: My order is delayed. What should I do?
q3.answer: USPS occasionally experiences delays. If your package hasn't arrived within 5 business days, please contact us with your order number.

q4.question: Can I change my shipping address?
q4.answer: Contact us immediately if you need to change your address. Once an order ships, we cannot modify the destination.
